Noura Mostafa Qadry, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Noura, (amụrụ na June 18, 1954 dị ka Elweya Mostafa Mohamed Adry) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Egypt lara ezumike nká
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Egypt n'oge 1970s ma gaa n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 1990s, ma na-eyi Hijab (Islamic Scarf), na-ebi ndụ okpukpe ugbu a.
A mụrụ Noura na Cairo nye ndị nne na nna Ijipt na mpaghara Shubra
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Poussi
Kemgbe afọ 1990, ọ jụrụ ọdịdị mgbasa ozi ọ bụla ma na-ebi ndụ dị jụụ dị ka onye Alakụba na-efe ofufe.
